query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.slug, p.status, p.currentWeightGrams, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM puppy_photos WHERE puppyId = p.id) as photo_count,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weight_logs WHERE puppyId = p.id) as weight_count
FROM puppies p ORDER BY p.birthOrder;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2pGxiNThVLMyZ1b.1a2ce0195854 --database cubTCKQneecSbqSJATRBZZ --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, p.slug, p.status, p.currentWeightGrams, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM puppy_photos WHERE puppyId = p.id) as photo_count,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM weight_logs WHERE puppyId = p.id) as weight_count
FROM puppies p ORDER BY p.birthOrder;
